title: Chained checkout commands
description: Chain all commands for one checkout
snippet: git add . && git commit -m "MESSAGE" && git push origin BRANCH
notes: Replace MESSAGE with valid commit message, and BRANCH with current branch name

title: Copy
description: Copies one or more files from one location to another
notes: /Y - Suppresses prompting to confirm that you want to overwrite an existing destination file

title: XCopy
description: Copies files and directories, including subdirectories
notes: /E - Copies all subdirectories, even if they are empty

title: Directory Exists
description: Checks to see if a directory exists
notes:
Note the \ at the end of the path. Will look for file existence otherwise

Can also precede exist with not to check file doesn't exist

title: Update Submodules
description: Updates all submodules in a repo
